comments.body:
üéâ **Fix Released in v1.4.101**

@textorhub

Your issue has been resolved with ULTRA-PRIORITY treatment and is now available in version 1.4.101.

## What was fixed:
- Added orange "Geo-Restricted" badges for all 10 libraries with geographic access limitations
- Updated library descriptions with specific IP requirements and access notes
- Enhanced user awareness of which libraries require VPN or regional access

## Libraries now marked with geo-blocking indicators:
### üá¶üáπ Austria
- University of Graz - requires Austrian IP

### üá≥üá¥ Norway
- Norwegian National Library - requires Norwegian IP

### üá´üá∑ France
- Grenoble Municipal Library - requires French IP

### üá¨üáß UK
- Trinity College Cambridge - may have restrictions

### üáÆüáπ Italy (4 libraries)
- BDL (Biblioteca Digitale Lombarda) - Italian IP for some collections
- Florence (ContentDM Plutei) - may require Italian IP
- Internet Culturale - some collections Italy-only
- Verona Library (NBM) - Italian IP for full access

### üá™üá∏ Spain (2 libraries)
- BNE (Biblioteca Nacional de Espa√±a) - Spanish IP for some content
- MDC Catalonia - may require Spanish/Catalan IP

## Validation completed:
‚úÖ All 10 libraries now show geo-restriction badges in the UI
‚úÖ Library descriptions updated with access requirements
‚úÖ Comprehensive documentation created
‚úÖ No regressions in other functionality

The new version should be available for download shortly. The application will auto-update, or you can download it manually from the releases page.

Thank you for helping improve MSS Downloader\!

*This fix was deployed autonomously after passing comprehensive validation tests.*
